name: Timekeepers (itch)
description:
Timekeepers is a strategic time based card game made for the "Out Of Time" Riverside Game Jam hosted by the Double Eleven team! We had a fun time making this game and we hope you enjoy it too!

Also features the glorious, the one of a kind, the absolutely perfect being that is Eggburt. :)


Josh Farnaby-Most of art and card concepts/Story mode concept. Also the sound effects.

Nicky Emery(NomsAllDay on Itch.io)-Programming and a small amount of art. Also the music track.

Luke Henry-Game Tester/Game Balancer. Some art and some card concepts.
